org.xandercat.pmdb.util

Class Alerts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xandercat.pmdb.util.Alerts

  • public class Alerts
extends Object
    Utility class for managing application alert messages to users. Should be paired with a layout template to present and layout the alerts in the view.
    Author:
    Scott Arnold
